column5: Hey ryan good to see you back on can't wait to get for browns again this year.
CAN ANYONE CONFIRM THE TROUT OPENER FOR THIS YEAR.  I AM HAVING A DEBATE ON THE EXACT DATE>>  CAN ANYONE TELL ME  APRIL 23 OR 30th  Please help me put this to bed  Dave
Here
Always the last Saturday in April.
SO THE 30th of April.   HE isnsist its the 23rd for some reason  Dave
I like this one better..
Zone 16.. 4th Saturday !
4th saturday in April so it's the 23rd not the 30th
CRAIG  The minstry says in its book  4th sat in April not the last  http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/stdprodconsume/groups/lr/@mnr/@letsfish/documents/document/mnr_e001336.pdf

Yep trout opener the 23rd of April. Always was the last saturday in April but they changed the wording of the regs last year. It will only make a difference for this year and next when there is actually 5 saturdays in April.
That is also the Easter weekend this year:  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=51560
January 1st if you live in an actual fishing area
because the regs are never confusing
CANT WAIT!!!
My bad - didn't know they had changed it.  Doesn't really matter, since the best fishing will be over and done long before then.
thank's, I thought it was the 30th if I didn't read this I would have missed a week of trout fishing  I can't wait

Dave....I'm looking at the regulations now..For Zone 17 It is the 4th Saturday of the month, and there happens to be 5 Saturdays this April..so enjoy fishing on the 23rd of April Hope this is the answer Fred
Rapids are open 365
The opener is on the 30th so please, NOBODY head out on the 23rd!!!  ( heh he heh )
23, bring the regulation booklet with tell mnr that is says 4th sat april... or fish close to Lake O.. open all yr
Nice
DAVE CHECK YOUR FACEBOOK
Trout season is always open.......somewhere!!!  S.
That is hilarious!
Looks like I'll be celebrating Easter by catching some big browns and not via eating ham/turkey.  Can't wait, these shack nasties are driving me crazy.
I dunno where I'll be on opener, but it definitely won't be fishing for steelhead!   Bring on the residents!
